column5: Hey everyone I have not been talking as much as I would like to but I got a nice pic of me and my buddy out on Lake Simcoe just in front of Lagoon City. We went out at about 8am, and the water was dead calm. We went for a little spin and stuck on the side of a shore wall and  had a HUGE bass on but he dove in between the rocks and swam back and my braid rubbed against the rock and broke. I was really mad after that so I finally got 1 more after that. Here he is.
that's a real nice fish for sure
Thanks Terry. I am heading out at about 10 am again today.
